instructions: Prepare a medium fire and let it burn down to hot coals.
Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook onion until soft, add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add blood plums, sherry vinegar, honey, and water to the saucepan.
Simmer until plums are soft and mixture thickens slightly.
Season mackerel with salt.
Grill or pan-fry mackerel until just cooked through.
Serve mackerel with blood plum agrodolce.

recipe_name: Whole Grilled Sardines with Chermoula and Steamed Potatoes
instructions: Combine all chermoula ingredients.
Steam new potatoes until tender.
Season sardines with salt and pepper, brush with olive oil, and grill for 3-4 minutes per side.
Serve grilled sardines with chermoula and steamed potatoes.
Freeze snapper fillet for 30 minutes to firm up.
Thinly slice snapper against the grain and arrange on a plate.
Combine salmoriglio ingredients and drizzle over snapper.
Serve immediately.

recipe_name: Confit Tuna with Green Olives and Red Chilli
instructions: Season tuna steaks with salt and pepper.
Place tuna in an oven-safe dish, add garlic, red chili, green olives and submerge in oil.
Bake at 100°C for 30-40 minutes.
Roast cherry tomatoes at 200°C for 20-25 minutes.
Serve out of oven dish with crusty bread.
